articles.title: Corporation for Public Broadcasting votes itself out of existence
articles.description:
The private agency, which has distributed federal funding to PBS, NPR and hundreds of local television and radio stations across the country for more than a half-century, saw its appropriations from Congress eliminated this past summer.

articles.title: US cuts the number of vaccines recommended for every child, a move slammed by physicians
articles.description:
